PersistentScript.name: Settings
PersistentScript.script:
init start
local minAmount = 30 local randMinAmount = minAmount charmlvl = $mlevel edwaste = 0 letmemove = false cananswerforpotions = false cananswerforhuntoptions = false init end
auto(100) if not dontshoot then if $targetingtarget.id ~= 0 and maround(10) == 1 then useoncreature(itemid('sudden death rune'), $target) wait(500) end end
setpvpmode("security","white") if maround(10) == 1 then egfha = 1 else egfha = 2 end
if $wptsection ~= "Refill" then if $mlevel < charmlvl then navsay("lowermlvl") wait(4000) end end
if keephaste then setsetting('ConditionHealer/Rules/NewHealRule/Enabled', 'yes') else setsetting('ConditionHealer/Rules/NewHealRule/Enabled', 'no') end
setlootingdestination("mainbp", mainbp) setlootingdestination("supplybp", supplybp) cb = getsetting('Cavebot/Enabled') if cb == 'yes' then if not $navigation then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') messagebox("Navigation","Please connect to navigation server and start cavebot again. If you dont know how to connect NAVIGATION ROOM check navi guide file.") end end
if getuseroption('pvpes') then setuseroption('fbomb', false) if $pzone then setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'yes') else setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'no') end
else
setsetting('Cavebot/WalkThroughPlayers', 'yes')
end --[[ if maround(10) == 1 and friendonscreen and accesstoreach and $targetingtarget.dist > 3 and $posz == 6 then setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Stance', 'Keep Away') else setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/Stance', 'No Movement') end
if maround(10) == 1 and $targetingtarget.id ~= 0 then useoncreature(itemid('sudden death rune'), $target) wait(500) end
]]--
-----------------------

PersistentScript.name: Functions
PersistentScript.script:
init start friendwaste = 0 init end auto(1000) fname = getuseroption('friendname') mainbp = getuseroption('MainBP') supplybp = getuseroption('SuppliesBP') maxgmp = getuseroption('MaxMana') maxava = getuseroption('MaxAVA') maxfbomb = getuseroption('MaxFBOMB') maxsds = getuseroption('MaxSDS') mingmp = getuseroption('MinMana') minava = getuseroption('MinAVA') minfbomb = getuseroption('MinFBOMB') minsds = getuseroption('MinSDS') useextrabp = getuseroption('uebp') fbomb = getuseroption('fbomb') sharemoney = getuseroption('sharemoney') mananame = "great mana potion" cre = getcreature(fname) keephaste = getuseroption('KeepHasted') waitime = getuseroption('waittime') waittime = waitime * 1000
function firebomb() if fbomb then
while 1 == 1 do local tile = gettile($posx, $posy, $posz) local titemcount = tile.itemcount-1 for i=1, tile.itemcount do if tile.item[i].id == 2118 or tile.item[i].id == 2119 then goto firebombdone end end if itemcount("fire bomb rune") < 1 or $mppc < 20 then goto firebombdone end dontshoot = true setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/NewHealRule/Enabled', 'no')
--useitemon(3192, 0, ground($posx, $posy, $posz)) useoncreature(itemid('fire bomb rune'), $self)
wait(200) end ::firebombdone:: dontshoot = false setsetting('PotionHealer/Rules/NewHealRule/Enabled', 'yes')
end end
function keeploc(px,py)
setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no')
if $posx ~= px or $posy ~= py then reachlocation(px, py, $posz) end wait(1000) end
function bpsforbank() if not islocation(1) then gotolabel("gobank") else closewindows() wait(1000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end if useextrabp then while windowcount < 3 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end end end
function withdrawmoney()
Mana = math.positive(maxgmp - itemcount("great mana potion")) * 120 AVA = math.positive(maxava - itemcount("avalanche rune")) * 45 FBOMBS = math.positive(maxfbomb - itemcount("fire bomb rune")) * 117 SDS = math.positive(maxsds - itemcount("sudden death rune")) * 118 Total = math.ceil(Mana + AVA + FBOMBS + SDS, 10000) + 10000
if islocation(1) then npctalk("hi", "deposit all","yes","withdraw "..Total, "yes", "balance") else gotolabel("enterbank") end end
function suppshop() if islocation() then
closewindows() wait(1000) while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,800) minimizewindows('equip') wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end if useextrabp then while windowcount < 3 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end
sellflasks()
--GMP amount2 = tonumber(maxgmp) - itemcount("great mana potion") while amount2 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("great mana potion", amount2) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("great mana potion",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount2 = amount2-100 end
--AVA amount3 = tonumber(maxava) - itemcount("Avalanche Rune") while amount3 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("Avalanche rune", amount3) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("Avalanche rune",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount3 = amount3-100 end --FBOMB amount3 = tonumber(maxfbomb) - itemcount("fire bomb Rune") while amount3 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("fire bomb rune", amount3) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("fire bomb rune",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount3 = amount3-100 end -- SDS amount3 = tonumber(maxsds) - itemcount("sudden death rune") while amount3 > 0 and islocation(1) do buyitems("sudden death rune", amount3) waitping(2,3)
moveitems("sudden death rune",supplybp, mainbp)
waitping(2,3) amount3 = amount3-100 end end
npcsay("bye") end
function checksupp()
if itemcount("great mana potion") + 10 < tonumber(maxgmp) or itemcount("Avalanche Rune") < tonumber(maxava) then gotolabel("start") end
end
function selfonlyiftraped() setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'yes') end
function selfnoonlyiftraped() setsetting('Targeting/Creatures/Category A/Setting1/OnlyIfTrapped', 'no') end
function bothonlyiftraped() navsay("bothonlyiftraped") end
function bpsforhunt() higherwindows('equip')
closewindows() wait(1000)
while windowcount() < 2 do closewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(mainbp, "back", true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() wait(500,800) openitem(supplybp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end
if useextrabp then while windowcount < 3 do openitem(extrabp,mainbp,true) wait(500,800) resizewindows() end end
setsetting('Looting/OpenNextBP', 'yes') end

PersistentScript.name: Variables
PersistentScript.script:
--Variables init start
init end
auto(100)
if itemcount("great mana potion") <= tonumber(mingmp) or itemcount("avalanche rune") <= tonumber(minava) or itemcount("fire bomb rune") <= tonumber(minfbomb) or itemcount("sudden death rune") <= tonumber(minsds) then havesupply = false else havesupply = true end
if cre.onscreen then friendonscreen = true else friendonscreen = false end
mparty = $self.party fparty = cre.party if mparty == 0 and fparty == 0 then party = 'not in party' elseif fparty == 1 or fparty == 2 then if fparty == 1 then party = 'join to party on ek' elseif fparty == 2 then party = 'join to party on ed' end else if mparty == 3 or 4 then party = 'shared is not enabled' end if mparty == 7 or mparty == 8 then party = 'shared not working' end if mparty == 5 or mparty == 6 then party = 'shared working' end end

PersistentScript.name: Nav Messages
PersistentScript.script:
init start function navmessages( m) -----
if m.message =="startb" then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') end if m.message =="stopb" then setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no') end
print(" .."..m.message.."..")
if m.message == "youcanreachmonsters" then accesstoreach = true end if cananswerforpotions then
if m.message == "ekhavenotpotionshunt" then navsay("okletsleave") navsay("okletsleave") navsay("okletsleave") gotolabel("leave","leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') end if m.message == 'doyouhavepotionshunt' then if havesupply then navsay("yesihavepotionshunt")
else
navsay("ihavenotpotionshunt") gotolabel("leave","leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes')
end end end
if m.message == "golure1" then ::gl1:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure9") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure9' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl1 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure2" then ::gl2:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure1") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure1' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl2 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure3" then ::gl3:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure2") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure2' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl3 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure4" then ::gl4:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure3") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure3' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl4 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure5" then ::gl5:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure4") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure4' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl5 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure6" then ::gl6:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure5") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure5' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl6 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure7" then ::gl7:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure6") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure6' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl7 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure8" then ::gl8:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure7") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure7' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl8 wait(500) end end if m.message == "golure9" then ::gl9:: gotolabel("skipwhile","Lure8") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') if $wptsection == 'Lure8' and $wptid == 002 then navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") navsay("okletsgonextlure") else goto gl9 wait(500) end end
if m.message == 'bothonlyiftraped' then selfonlyiftraped() accesstoreach = false end
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
if m.message == "ekhavenotpotions" then navsay("okletsleave") navsay("okletsleave") navsay("okletsleave") gotolabel("leave7","leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') end if cananswerforhuntoptions then if m.message == 'doyouhavepotions' then
if havesupply then navsay("yesihavepotions") gotolabel("enterhunt") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') else navsay("noihavenotpotions") gotolabel("leave7","leave") setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'yes') end end end
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----- end init end

PersistentScript.name: SIO
PersistentScript.script:
init start init end auto(100) -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.0.0' local friends = { fname }
local healHPPC = 80 -- Minimum HPPC to heal local minHPPC = 70 -- Minimum HPPC you should have to heal local minMPPC = 20 -- Minimum MPPC you should have to heal
-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE --
table.lower(friends)
if $hppc >= minHPPC and $mppc >= minMPPC then foreach creature m 'pt' do if m.hppc < healHPPC and table.find(friends, m.name:lower()) then cast('exura sio "' .. m.name:lower()) waitping() return end end end

PersistentScript.name: AVA
PersistentScript.script:
auto(200)
local Monsters = {"Frazzlemaw", "Silencer","Shock Head"}
local Players = { Consider = getuseroption('pvpes'), Distance = 10, FloorDifference = 1, SafeList = {fname, "Eternal Oblivion"}, }
local Runes = { {Name = "avalanche rune", Amount = 2}, }
local SpecialAreas = { --{min x, max x, min y, max y, z} }
local UseTargetState = true
-- DO NOT CHANGE BELOW --
local i, LastFloor, Exhaust = 1, $posz, $timems
while Runes[i] ~= nil do Runes[i].Info = runeinfo(Runes[i].Name)
if Runes[i].Info.itemid == 0 or Runes[i].Info.castarea == 'None' or not Runes[i].Info.group:find('Attack') then table.remove(Runes, i) else Runes[i].Monsters = Runes[i].Monsters or Monsters
table.lower(Runes[i].Monsters) i = i + 1 end end if not dontshoot then if $target.id ~= 0 then
if $posz ~= LastFloor then LastFloor, Exhaust = $posz, $timems + 2000 return end
if $timems >= Exhaust and ($targeting or not UseTargetState) then for _, Rune in ipairs(Runes) do if cancast(Rune.Info) and not isinsidearea(SpecialAreas) and clientitemhotkey(Rune.Name, 'crosshair') ~= 'not found' then if not Players.Consider or paroundfloorignore(Players.Distance, Players.FloorDifference, unpack(Players.SafeList)) == 0 then local area = {x = 0, y = 0, z = 0, amount = 0}
for a = 0, 7 do local i, j = -a, -a
while j <= a do i = -a
while i <= a do if (math.abs(j) == a or math.abs(i) == a) and (tilehasinfo($posx + i, $posy + j, $posz)) then local posx, posy = $posx + i, $posy + j
if tileshootable(posx,posy, $posz) then local count = 0
foreach creature c 'mfx' do if isonspellarea(c, '3x3', false, i, j) and (#Rune.Monsters == 0 or table.find(Rune.Monsters, c.name:lower())) then count = count + 1 end end
if count > area.amount then area.x, area.y, area.z, area.amount = posx, posy, $posz, count end end end
if math.abs(j) ~= a then i = i + 2 * a else i = i + 1 end end j = j+1
end end
if area.amount >= Rune.Amount then pausewalking(5000) useitemon(Rune.Name, 0, ground(area.x, area.y, area.z)) waitping(1.2, 1.4) pausewalking(0) end end end end end end end

PersistentScript.name: Spells

HUDScript.name: MonitorMyHunting
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- Author: `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' -- -- Monitor My Hunting! -- -- Version: 1.0 -- Created: 29.12.2013 -- Last update: 29.12.2013 --
local MMH = { SHOW_ALL_ITEMS = false, SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES = false, }
-- [[ Do not change anything below this line. ]] --
-- [[ COLORS ]] -- MMH.COLORS = {} MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR = color(255, 255, 255, 0) MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(97, 105, 36, 20), 0.23, color(105, 114, 39, 20), 0.76, color(55, 60, 21, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)} MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(120, 120, 120, 20), 0.23, color(100, 100, 100, 20), 0.76, color(35, 35, 35, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)} MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND = MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND
-- [[ ELEMENTS ]] -- MMH.ELEMENTS = {} MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = -1 MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = -1
-- [[ SECTION STATES ]] -- MMH.SECTIONS = {} MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = true MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = true
-- [[ OTHERS ]] -- filterinput(false, true, false, false) local MOVING, TEMP, MOVED = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then if (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON) then resetcharactertime() resetlootcounter() resetexpcounter() friendwaste = 0 elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED) then MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED = not MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED elseif (e.elementid == MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED) then MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED = not MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then MOVING, TEMP = true, {$cursor.x - MOVED[1], $cursor.y - MOVED[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then MOVING = false end end
setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
if (MOVING) then auto(10) MOVED = {$cursor.x - TEMP[1], $cursor.y - TEMP[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.right - 424 + MOVED[1], $worldwin.top + MOVED[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, MMH.COLORS.FONT_COLOR, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local ROW_QUANTITY, STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = 0, measurestring('TEMP') local ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH, ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY, ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0 local SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH, SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY, SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = 0, 0, 0
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('Monitor My Hunting v1.0', 6, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESET_BUTTON_BACKGROUND)) MMH.ELEMENTS.RESET_BUTTON = drawroundrect(196, 0, 44, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('RESET', 202, 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 23, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Looting Accuracy', 6, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 23, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(string.format('%.2f', $lootaccuracy) .. '%', 136, 23 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5 + 1)
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 41, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('ITEMS LOOTED', 6, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_ITEMS_LOOTED = drawroundrect(220, 41, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 41 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach lootingitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_ITEMS or ItemEntry.amountlooted > 0) then ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountlooted ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH = ItemEntry.sellprice * ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.ITEMS_LOOTED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(ITEM_LOOTED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH = ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH + ITEM_LOOTED_WORTH end end
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.SECTION_HEADER_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('SUPPLIES USED', 6, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end MMH.ELEMENTS.SWITCH_SUPPLIES_USED = drawroundrect(220, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, 64 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
foreach supplyitem ItemEntry do if (MMH.SHOW_ALL_SUPPLIES or ItemEntry.amountused > 0) then SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY = ItemEntry.amountused SUPPLY_USED_WORTH = ItemEntry.buyprice * SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(ItemEntry.id, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext(((#ItemEntry.name > 16 and string.match(string.sub(ItemEntry.name, 1, 16), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...') or ItemEntry.name):capitalizeall(), 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num(SUPPLY_USED_QUANTITY) .. ' (' .. math.floor(SUPPLY_USED_WORTH / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + SUPPLY_USED_WORTH end end
if (MMH.SECTIONS.SUPPLIES_USED) then setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 200), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 200), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 200)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2)
setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_SourceOver) drawitem(3031, 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 50, 100) setcompositionmode(CompositionMode_Automatic)
drawtext('ED WASTE', 28, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_VALUE_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(130, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(num($moneyspent) .. ' (' .. math.floor($moneyspent / 100) / 10 .. 'K)', 136, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1 end
SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH + $moneyspent
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.ENTRY_NAME_BACKGROUND)) drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Total: ' .. num(SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 15 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5)
ROW_QUANTITY = ROW_QUANTITY + 1
setfontsize(8)
STRING_WIDTH, STRING_HEIGHT = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) then addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_POSITIVE_BACKGROUND)) else addgradcolors(unpack(MMH.COLORS.RESULT_NEGATIVE_BACKGROUND)) end drawroundrect(0, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18, 240, 20, 2, 2)
drawtext(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH >= SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH and ('EK + ED: ')) or ('EK + ED: ')) .. num(ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) .. ' GPs (' .. math.abs(math.floor(((ITEMS_LOOTED_WORTH - SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH) * 3600) / ($charactertime / 1000) / 100) / 10) .. ' k/h)', 6, 87 + ROW_QUANTITY * 18 + 20 / 2 - STRING_HEIGHT * 0.5) edwaste = SUPPLIES_USED_WORTH

HUDScript.name: MonitorMyStats
HUDScript.script:
init start -- -- 88 -- "" ,d -- 88 -- ,adPPYba, 88 8b,dPPYba, 88,dPYba,,adPYba, ,adPPYYba, MM88MMM ,adPPYba, -- I8[ "" 88 88P' "Y8 88P' "88" "8a "" `Y8 88 a8P_____88 -- `"Y8ba, 88 88 88 88 88 ,adPPPPP88 88 8PP""""""" -- aa ]8I 88 88 88 88 88 88, ,88 88, "8b, ,aa -- `"YbbdP"' 88 88 88 88 88 `"8bbdP"Y8 "Y888 `"Ybbd8"' --
-- Name: Monitor My Stats -- Last Updated: 19/12/2013 -- Version: 1.0
local MMS = { ShowInfo = true,
Title = "www.eliscripts.com", Creator = "Yoko", Info = 'ED Version Roshamuul', Version = '1.0.0' }
-- [[ Do not change anything below this line. ]] --
filterinput(false, true, false, false)
local HUD_Sections = { {Name = 'OTHERS', State = true, Items = { {'Ping', function() return $ping .. ' (avg: ' .. $pingaverage .. ')' end}, {'Bank Balance', function() return num($balance) end}, } },
{Name = 'CHARACTER STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Level', function() return $level .. ' (' .. 100 - math.floor(($exp - expatlvl($level)) * 100 / (expatlvl($level + 1) - expatlvl($level))) .. '%)' end}, {'Experience', function() return num($exp) end}, {'Magic Level', function() return $mlevel .. ' (' .. 100 - $mlevelpc .. '%)' end}, {'Weapon Skill', function() local _ = WeaponSkill() return _.skill .. ' (' .. 100 - _.skillpc .. '%)' end}, {'Shielding', function() return $shielding .. ' (' .. 100 - $shieldingpc .. '%)' end}, {'Fishing', function() return $fishing .. ' (' .. 100 - $fishingpc .. '%)' end} } },
{Name = 'ENGINE STATES', State = true, Items = { {'Spell Healer', function() return getsetting('SpellHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('SpellHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Potion Healer', function() return getsetting('PotionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('PotionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Condition Healer', function() return getsetting('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ConditionHealer/Enabled') end}, {'Mana Training', function() return getsetting('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('ManaTrainer/Enabled') end}, {'Cavebot', function() return getsetting('Cavebot/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Cavebot/Enabled') end}, {'Looting', function() return getsetting('Looting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Looting/Enabled') end}, {'Targeting', function() return getsetting('Targeting/Enabled') end, function() return toggle('Targeting/Enabled') end} } },
{Name = 'BOTTING STATS', State = true, Items = { {'Experience per Hour', function() return num($exphour) end}, {'Experience Left', function() return num(exptolevel()) end}, {'Experience Today', function() return num($expgained) end}, {'Time to Next Level', function() return time(timetolevel()) end}, {'Played Time', function() return time(math.floor($charactertime / 1000)) end}, {'Stamina', function() return time($stamina) end} } } }
local HUD_Colors = { Font = color(255, 255, 255, 0), SectionHeaderBackground = {0.0, color(97, 105, 36, 20), 0.23, color(105, 114, 39, 20), 0.76, color(55, 60, 21, 20)}, EntryNameBackground = {0.0, color(75, 75, 75, 20), 0.23, color(45, 45, 45, 20), 0.76, color(19, 19, 19, 20)}, EntryValueBackground = {0.0, color(120, 120, 120, 20), 0.23, color(100, 100, 100, 20), 0.76, color(35, 35, 35, 20)}, EntryValueEnabledBackground = {0.0, color(65, 96, 12, 20), 0.23, color(67, 99, 13, 20), 0.76, color(36, 52, 6, 20)}, EntryValueDisabledBackground = {0.0, color(90, 12, 15, 20), 0.23, color(98, 13, 17, 20), 0.76, color(52, 6, 9, 20)}, }
function WeaponSkill() local SkillTypes = { ['axe'] = {type = 'axe', skill = $axe, skillpc = $axepc}, ['club'] = {type = 'club', skill = $club, skillpc = $clubpc}, ['sword'] = {type = 'sword', skill = $sword, skillpc = $swordpc}, ['bow'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['distance weapon'] = {type = 'distance', skill = $distance, skillpc = $distancepc}, ['no weapon'] = {type = 'fist', skill = $fist, skillpc = $fistpc}, ['rod'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, ['wand'] = {type = 'magic', skill = $mlevel, skillpc = $mlevelpc}, }
return SkillTypes[findweapontype()] end
local Moving, Temp, Moved = false, {0, 0}, {0, 0}
function inputevents(e) if (e.type == IEVENT_LMOUSEDOWN) then for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (e.elementid == Section.StateSwitch) then Section.State = not Section.State return end end for _, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then for _, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do if (e.elementid == SectionItem[4]) then SectionItem[3]() return end end end end end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEDOWN) then Moving, Temp = true, {$cursor.x - Moved[1], $cursor.y - Moved[2]} end
if (e.type == IEVENT_MMOUSEUP) then Moving = false end end
setmaskcolorxp(0) init end
if (Moving) then auto(10) Moved = {$cursor.x - Temp[1], $cursor.y - Temp[2]} end
setposition($clientwin.left + 5 + Moved[1], $worldwin.top + Moved[2]) setfontstyle('Tahoma', 8, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, color(0, 0, 0, 20))
local YPosition, SectionRow, SectionItemsRow = 0, 0, 0
if MMS.ShowInfo then local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 0, 240, 21, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Title, 6, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 22) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 0, 110, 21, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Creator, 136, 21 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5)
setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 0 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Info, 6, 24 + 0 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, 24 + 1 * 18, 240, 15, 2, 2) drawtext('Script version:', 6, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 16) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, 24 + 1 * 18, 110, 15, 2, 2) drawtext(MMS.Version, 136, 24 + 1 * 18 + 15 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
YPosition = 22 + 2 * 19 end
for SectionIndex, Section in ipairs(HUD_Sections) do setfontsize(8)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.SectionHeaderBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 20, 2, 2) drawtext(Section.Name, 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 21) if (Section.State) then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end Section.StateSwitch = drawroundrect(220, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 20, 20, 2, 2) drawtext('X', 228, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 20 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
SectionRow = SectionRow + 1
if (Section.State) then setfontsize(7)
local StringWidth, StringHeight = measurestring('TEMP')
for SectionItemIndex, SectionItem in ipairs(Section.Items) do setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryNameBackground)) drawroundrect(0, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 240, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[1], 6, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1)
if (Section.Name == 'ENGINE STATES') then local EngineCurrentState = SectionItem[2]()
setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) if (EngineCurrentState == 'yes') then addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueEnabledBackground)) else addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueDisabledBackground)) end HUD_Sections[SectionIndex].Items[SectionItemIndex][4] = drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2)
drawtext((EngineCurrentState == 'yes' and ('On')) or ('Off'), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) else setfillstyle('gradient', 'linear', 2, 0, 0, 0, 17) addgradcolors(unpack(HUD_Colors.EntryValueBackground)) drawroundrect(130, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19), 110, 16, 2, 2) drawtext(SectionItem[2](), 136, YPosition + (SectionRow * 23) + (SectionItemsRow * 19) + 16 / 2 - StringHeight * 0.5 + 1) end
SectionItemsRow = SectionItemsRow + 1 end end end

Waypoint.script: --location if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("start") end
cananswerforpotions = false cananswerforhuntoptions = false
--location if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("gotomshop") end
--location if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("goroshamuul") end
--location if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("sailtorosh") else bpsforhunt() end charmlvl = $mlevel
charmlvl = $mlevel selfonlyiftraped()
--location if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("getready") else --bpsforhunt() cananswerforhuntoptions = true end
setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no')
cananswerforhuntoptions = false wait(4000)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("enterhunt") cananswerforhuntoptions = false else gotolabel("start","Lure1") cananswerforhuntoptions = false end

if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end firebomb() cananswerforpotions = true keeploc(33534,32527)
setsetting('Cavebot/Enabled', 'no')
cananswerforpotions = false letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure2") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33523,32520)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure3") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33512,32516)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure4") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33549,32522)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure5") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33558,32533)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure6") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33578,32531)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure7") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33550,32534)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure8") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33546,32534)
letmemove = true wait(waittime*2)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure9") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel("start") end keeploc(33550,32534)
letmemove = true wait(waittime)
--location if not islocation() then gotolabel("skipwhile") else selfnoonlyiftraped() firebomb() gotolabel("start","Lure1") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("leave") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("leave7") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("sailtosvar") end
if not islocation(3) then gotolabel("gotodepot") else gotolabel("start","Refill") end
